publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1368 Mike Watson: Incitement to Racial Hatred-That the Parliament notes with disgust the British National Party's election leaflet for the European Parliament elections, delivered to every household in Scotland; is appalled that its xenophobic content is designed to stir up racial hatred and division; further notes that the Scottish Refugee Council has issued a detailed rebuttal of the assertions which it contains, and urges the Lord Advocate to examine the content of the leaflet with a view to bringing a prosecution under the appropriate legislation.

S2M-1368 Mike Watson: Incitement to Racial Hatred-That the Parliament notes with disgust the British National Party's election leaflet for the European Parliament elections, delivered to every household in Scotland; is appalled that its xenophobic content is designed to stir up racial hatred and division; further notes that the Scottish Refugee Council has issued a detailed rebuttal of the assertions which it contains, and urges the Lord Advocate to examine the content of the leaflet with a view to bringing a prosecution under the appropriate legislation. Supported by: Stewart Stevenson*, Michael Matheson*, Frances Curran*, Carolyn Leckie*

S2M-1368 Incitement to Racial Hatred (lodged on 26 May 2004) Ms Wendy Alexander*, Scott Barrie*, Donald Gorrie*, Kate Maclean*, Christine May*, Bristow Muldoon*, Margaret Jamieson*, Trish Godman*, Jackie Baillie*, Dr Elaine Murray*, Elaine Smith*, Fiona Hyslop*, Bill Butler*, Des McNulty*, Karen Gillon*
S2M-1368 Incitement to Racial Hatred (lodged on 26 May 2004) Dr Sylvia Jackson*, Mr Alasdair Morrison*
S2M-1368 Incitement to Racial Hatred (lodged on 26 May 2004) Pauline McNeill*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Karen Whitefield*, Ms Sandra White*, Alex Neil*
S2M-1368 Incitement to Racial Hatred (lodged on 26 May 2004) Mr Kenneth Macintosh*, Mark Ballard*, John Swinburne*
S2M-1368 Incitement to Racial Hatred (lodged on 26 May 2004) Janis Hughes*
S2M-1368 Incitement to Racial Hatred (lodged on 26 May 2004) Cathie Craigie*, Margaret Smith*
S2M-1368 Incitement to Racial Hatred (lodged on 26 May 2004) Cathy Peattie*
S2M-1368 Incitement to Racial Hatred (lodged on 26 May 2004) Mr Jamie Stone*
